channel.title: CVE Feed for Jamie Bergen -- Plugin Notes Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jamie Bergen -- Plugin Notes Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-43326|2024-08-19T19:25:01.321Z -- jamie%20bergen -- plugin%20notes%20plus
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Jamie Bergen Plugin Notes Plus allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Plugin Notes Plus: from n/a through 1.2.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-37561|2024-07-22T13:34:50.371Z -- jamie%20bergen -- plugin%20notes%20plus
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jamie Bergen Plugin Notes Plus allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Plugin Notes Plus: from n/a through 1.2.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-37561|2024-07-20T09:18:10.393Z -- jamie%20bergen -- plugin%20notes%20plus
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jamie Bergen Plugin Notes Plus allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Plugin Notes Plus: from n/a through 1.2.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-37561|2024-08-02T03:57:40.023Z -- jamie%20bergen -- plugin%20notes%20plus
